articles.title: Baldur's Gate 3 passes Elden Ring and Breath of the Wild to become first game to win all five major GOTY awards - Gamesradar

articles.content:
Baldur's Gate 3 continues its unbreakable winning streak to become the first-ever game to grab gold at all five major Game of the Year awards.
